Articles.Content:
The O-2 Nighthawk Shuttle is the newest in space shuttle technology. The craft rises on ten LFEs, and re-enters as a plane with one turbojet with enough fuel to return from a quarter of the globe away.

Demo flight album:

http://imgur.com/a/Du4Ew#3

No mods are required, although one part on the entire craft requires NovaPunch. This is the braking radial chute. That one part is included in the download. I do not claim any credit for any of the parts used on the rocket, and NovaPunch belongs to Tiberion. If he wishes me to remove the radial chute from the download, then so be it.
